core.tut.pori.dao

Class SQLDeleteBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.dao.SQLDeleteBuilder

  • public class SQLDeleteBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class, which can be used to build an SQL DELETE clause. Note that the class has no implementations of its own of the SQLClause, but uses the same clauses as defined by SQLSelectBuilder (SQL WHERE).
